member.name: T:FX3USB.USB
member.summary: This class implements a safe version of the CyUSB.NET endpoint call XferData(buf, length)

member.name: M:FX3USB.USB.XferData(System.Byte[]@,System.Int32@,CyUSB.CyUSBEndPoint@)
member.summary: Equivalent to the CyUSBEndPoint.XferData(...) but with pointer pinning to ensure that the garbage collector does not move buffers
member.param: The buffer to transfer data into or out
Length of data to transfer. Can be overwritten with actual transfer length
Endpoint to perform the transfer operation on
member.returns: Bool indicating success of the transfer operation
